description:
Usagi finds herself teamed up with Seiya for the annual school softball tournament. To make matters worse, Usagi becomes a target of Seiya’s jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El poder del brillo de una estrella. La transformación de Chibi-Chibi.
Kagayaku Hoshi no Power! Chibi Chibi no Henshin
The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi`s Transformation
輝く星のパワー! ちびちびの変身
